full_text: With apologies for the delay, medical staff can accept his CPAP machine. Would you or one of your associates be able to bring it in next week? It must be provided to medical staff rather than directly to your client. Thank you, [b(6), b(7)(C)] >> [b(6), b(7)(C)] Mr [b(6), b(7)(C)] @gmail.com> 7/26/2019 9:50 AM >>> Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm. Thank you. [b(6), b(7)(C)] Page 2058 DOJ-OGR-00023694

text_blocks.content: With apologies for the delay, medical staff can accept his CPAP machine. Would you or one of your associates be able to bring it in next week? It must be provided to medical staff rather than directly to your client.
Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as [b(6), b(7)(C)]. The content is an email exchange regarding the delivery of a CPAP machine to Mr. Epstein.
